#summary STG defs

= Introduction =

The number of [STG] blocks in a .m3 file equals the number of [SEQS] blocks, and tells where in the [STC] list the animations of the corresponding [SEQS] block starts.


= Details =

{{{

// Size = 16 byte / 0x10 byte
// Complete
struct STG
{
    /*0x00*/ Reference name;
    /*0x08*/ Reference stcID;
};

}}}
